study_plan_entry.title: Landmark Papers in Cancer and Infection

instructors.name: van der Goot Grunberg Françoise Gisou

free_text.Content: The topics will cover all the fields in which the GHI and ISREC PIs work. This will allow the students to be exposed to (non exhaustive):[br/][br/][li] various pathogenic organisms (bacteria, viruses and helminths)[br/][li] different experimental infection models (cells, mice, daphnae, flies)[br/][li] various models to study animal development[br/][li] various systems to study cancer[br/][br/]Each session will include a 30 min introduction by the professors, followed by the presentation and dissection of a paper in the field. All students will prepare the paper beforehand and a student will be selected for the presentation.[br/]
free_text.Keywords: infection, cancer, development, cell division, epigenetics, genomics, drug development
